column7: na mbarimba ahaanan ka no ho. Na ɔkyɛɛ mbofra no mu maa Leah

column2: "Na ɔdze mbaawa no nye hɔn mba no dzii kan
column3: na ɔdze Leah nye ne mba no dzii hɔ
column4: na ɔdze Rahel nye Josef dzii ekyir."

column2: "Na ɔnoara paa ho kedzii hɔn enyim
column3: na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze mpɛn esuon
column4: dze kodur dɛ ɔbɛɛn no nua no."

column2: "Na Esau tutuu enguan hyiaa no kwan
column3: na ɔyɛɛ no etuu; na ɔdze ne nsa too no kɔn mu
na ohun mbaa no nye mbofra no; na obisaa dɛ
column4: Woananom na wɔka wo ho yi? Na Jakob buaa dɛ
column5: Mbofra a Nyankopɔn dze adom w'akowaa a."

column2: "Nna mbaawa no nye hɔn mba twee pinii
"Na Leah nye ne mba so twee pinii
column3: na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze: na n'ekyir no nna Josef nye Rahel twee pinii
Na ekuw a menye hɔn hyiae yi nyinara n'ase nye dɛn? Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Medze robɔhwehwɛ mo wura n'enyim enyimnyam."

column3: Dza mowɔ no ara dɔɔ so; mo nua
column4: ma w'adze nko hɔ mma wo."

column5: sɛ afei menya w'enyim enyimnyam a
column6: nna gye me nsamu akyɛdze: susuampa dɛ mehu w'enyim ara dɛ mbrɛ obiara bohu Nyankopɔn enyim

column3: gye m'akyɛdze a wɔdze abrɛ wo yi; osiandɛ Nyankopɔn adom me
column4: na eso dza mowɔ no dɔɔ so. Na ɔhyɛɛ no ma ɔgyee."

column3: Mo wura nyim dɛ mbofra yi yɛ mberɛw
column4: na eso nguan nye anantwi a wɔnye me nam yi wɔma enumfo: na sɛ wɔka hɔn dodow da kor a

column3: wɔmma mo wura mpa ho nkedzi n'akowaa enyim: na emi mobɔdwe m'enyi ara manantsew dɛ mbrɛ mbowa a wodzi m'enyim yi botum
column4: na dɛ mbrɛ mbofra no botum
column5: ekodu dɛ mubodu mo wura nkyɛn wɔ Seir."

column3: Nna ma memfa nyimpa a wɔka mo ho yi bi mingya wo. Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ma ɔnyɛ dɛn? Wɔmma minnya mo wura n'enyim enyimnyam."

column2: "Nna Esau saan da no ara faa no kwan do kɔr Seir."

column4: na osisii mpata maa no mbowa: dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ bea no ne dzin Sukɔt."

column2: "Na Jakob baa Sekem kurow a ɔwɔ Keenan asaase do no mu asomdwee mu
column3: wɔ ber a ofii Paddan-aram bae no; na ɔbɔbɔɔ asese wɔ kurow no n'enyim."

column2: "Na ɔtɔɔ asaase kakraba a ɔbɔɔ n'asesee wɔ do no
column3: wɔ Sekem n'egya Hamor ne mba no hɔ
na ɔfrɛɛ no El-elohe-Israel a asekyerɛ nye Israel Nyankopɔn."
